lst.name: sentence
lst.str: At a board meeting yesterday, Concac's directors deleted a provision allowing the holder of at least one-third of of all classes of its voting stock to call a special shareholders meeting and deleted another provision allowing shareholders to remove directors without cause, the company said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The defensive moves were taken because Mark IV had said it planned to elect a majority of its designees as directors at a special holders meeting if it succeeded in acquring a majority of the company's common stock in the offer, Conrac said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Board members were also instructed to keep confidential the terms of any transaction that might be entered into until it becomes final, the company said.
